item.description:
Craving for some fresh spices in the midst of winter? Then kick your taste buds up a notch with an authentic Indian buffet-style lunch at Mantra.

We'll meet at Mantra in downtown Boston at 12:30 pm on Saturday 3/5. As always, please try to be on time. =P

The cost of the buffet is $11.95 plus tax and gratuities will be $15.25.

Afterwards we will head out to Frog Pond in the Boston Common for some ice-skating to burn off some calories.

Admission is $4 and skate rental $8. For more information about Frog Pond, please check out the link. We do have a few buywithme coupons for discounted skating and rentals.

http://www.bostoncomm...

This RSVP is for both lunch and skating. Please indicate in your RSVP if you plan to attend lunch or skating only.
item.how_to_find_us: We have a large area reserved for our group in the back near the buffet.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Indian Buffet & Ice-Skating - Saturday 3/5
